extendedInfo.description: iZen provides Zen music that helps you reach an inner calm that you can't achieve in absolute silence. It gives your mind something peaceful and tranquil to concentrate on while you try to reach a state of higher awareness. iZen can help increase your concentration enough to stay with the meditation. It also helps free your mind from your day to day activities. Music has been used for thousands of years as a way to get people into a sacred mental state. iZen can help you enter one of the most relaxing state that you are searching for. iZen also helps you time your meditative session. It offers a convenient time setting option that you can decide how much time to spend on meditation. By setting specific duration beforehand, you can allow your mind to focus on your session and not on how long you've been sitting there. Once the music ends, you simply end your session. Waiting for the music to end is much more pleasant than being jarred out of your meditation with an alarm.4 of 8 music tracks are available in iZen Lite version:kw: iZen, Ultimate Practice, Zen Meditation, health, fitness, android applications

reviews.title: Not that great
reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t recommend. Low quality  sound. And opening track has very high pitched squeal in background. Feels like nails on a chalkboard.
reviews.author: Tamara Clore

reviews.title: Bad audio
reviews.comment: The audio is horribly low quality and doesn\'t help me reach a state of calm at all. If the audio was better or we at least had the option for high/low quality, I could rate better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smells like a scam.
reviews.comment: No place to update from market? It advertisers this app as full version then had ads and an upgrade button that doors stair to papal with no info or website, just a checkout. And there are totally random loud bell chimes that go against the music in all songs, which may be another ploy to make you upgrade and scam you through their scammy checkout link. Don\'t download this unread you are ok with bells and the lite version. False advertising of full very. Makes me think scam too. Reporting

reviews.comment: Very relaxing and helps me focus. I listen to it at work to drown out the negative atmosphere. I have always enjoyed Zen music. This is a great app!
